info.title: PyTrain API
info.description:
Operate and control Lionel Legacy/TMCC engines, trains, switches, accessories, routes, and LCS components.

This API is used by the Alexa skill and mobile apps. It is also used by the web UI and other third-party integrations.

For more information, visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/cdswindell/pytrainapi).

get.description: Stops all engines and trains, in their tracks; turns off all power districts.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: Enforce AMC2 validation. When true, the TMCC ID must resolve to a defined AMC2; otherwise the request fails. When false, the command is sent without validation.

strict.description: Enforce AMC2 validation. When true, the TMCC ID must resolve to a defined AMC2; otherwise the request fails. When false, the command is sent without validation.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: Enforce AMC2 validation. When true, the TMCC ID must resolve to a defined AMC2; otherwise the request fails. When false, the command is sent without validation.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: Enforce ASC2 validation. When true, the TMCC ID must resolve to a defined ASC2; otherwise the request fails. When false, the command is sent without validation.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: Enforce BPC2 validation. When true, the TMCC ID must resolve to a defined BPC2; otherwise the request fails. When false, the command is sent without validation.
